data.title: Time Zone & Clock Changes in Dallas County, Texas, USA
data.meta_description: Historic, present and future dates for daylight saving time and clock changes. Time changes between years 2023 and 2027 in USA – Texas – Dallas County are shown here.

The graph above illustrates clock changes in Dallas County during 2024.

Time Changes in Dallas County Over the Years

Daylight Saving Time (DST) changes do not necessarily occur on the same date every year.

Time zone changes for:

YearDate & TimeAbbreviationTime ChangeOffset After2023So, 12. Mär, 02:00CST → CDT+1 hour (DST start)UTC-5hSo, 5. Nov, 02:00CDT → CST-1 hour (DST end)UTC-6h2024So, 10. Nov, 02:00CDT → CST-1 hour (DST end)UTC-6h2026So, 8. Mär, 02:00CST → CDT+1 hour (DST start)UTC-5hSo, 1. Nov, 02:00CDT → CST-1 hour (DST end)UTC-6h2027So, 14. Mär, 02:00CST → CDT+1 hour (DST start)UTC-5hSo, 7. Nov, 02:00CDT → CST-1 hour (DST end)UTC-6h

* All times are local Dallas County time. Next time change is highlighted.

Data for the years before 1970 is not available for Dallas County, however, we have earlier time zone history for Chicago available.
